name: SUPER COLD
description:
For Mix and Game Jam

Love the Youtube channel that's why I'm here.

Just a very simple game with super hot slowing time mechanic when the player stands still.

ESDF to move, mouse to aim and shoot.

Some of the particles/screen shake inspired from Lazy devs: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdT68dsulMFouI2InvXWM5w

Music from:

https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?pid=38442#p

I had a lots of fun, hope you guys enjoy the game and the game jam!
